template.description: Template for any of the media analysis processes
template.name: MediaAnalysis

entry.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <LanguageDetection> field with subfields for each language identified by Media Server Language Detection. e.g:
<LanguageDetection> <language confidence="1.1240000000000001" rank="1" score="-1.347" startTime="0" duration="15180000">ENUK</language> <language confidence="1.1100000000000001" rank="2" score="-1.2949999999999999" startTime="15180000" duration="11760000">ENUS</language> </LanguageDetection>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <LanguageDetection> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[LanguageIdResult]"> <language> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="LanguageIdResult/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="rank"><xsl:value-of select="LanguageIdResult/rank"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="score"><xsl:value-of select="LanguageIdResult/score"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="LanguageIdResult/language"/> </language> </xsl:for-each> </LanguageDetection> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = SpeechLanguageId
[SpeechLanguageId] Type = LanguageID LanguageIdServers = localhost:15000 Mode = Cumulative
####################### Output ########################## [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <ImageHash> field with the image hash returned by Media Server. e.g:
<ImageHash> AAAAD AAAAD BAAAD BAAAD CAAAD CAAAD NIAAD DAFCC OIKDC DAAAD OIAAD EAAAD PIAAD EAAAD PIAAD FAAAD QIAAD FAAAD QIAAD GAAAD RIAAD ... </ImageHash> --> <xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ImageHash><xsl:value-of select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record/ImageHashResult/imageHash"/></ImageHash> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = Image
[Image] Type = image IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = ImageHash
[ImageHash] Type = ImageHash
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <NewsSegmentation> field with subfields for each news segment identified by Media Server News Segmentation, and adds a content page containing the text extracted from each news segment. e.g:
<NewsSegmentation> <segment score="78.9" type="Short story" startTime="80000" duration="156325689"> <terms> <term weight="170">buy</term> <term weight="120">business secretary says</term> <term weight="110">consider co investing</term> </terms> </segment> </NewsSegmentation> <DRECONTENT>business secretary says the government will consider co investing with a Buy on commercial terms <SIL> ...</DRECONTENT> -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <NewsSegmentation> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[NewsSegmentationResult]"> <segment score="{NewsSegmentationResult/score}" type="{NewsSegmentationResult/type}" startTime="{timestamp/startTime}" duration="{timestamp/duration}"> <terms> <xsl:for-each select="NewsSegmentationResult/terms/term"> <term weight="{weight}"><xsl:value-of select="text"/></term> </xsl:for-each> </terms> </segment> </xsl:for-each> </NewsSegmentation> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[NewsSegmentationResult]"> <DRECONTENT><xsl:value-of select="NewsSegmentationResult/storyText"/></DRECONTENT> </xsl:for-each> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = TranscribeSpeech AnalysisEngine1 = TextSegmentation AnalysisEngine2 = NewsSegmentation
[TranscribeSpeech] Type = SpeechToText SpeechToTextServers = localhost:15000 Language = ENUK Mode = relative ModeValue = 0.8
[TextSegmentation] Type = TextSegmentation Input = TranscribeSpeech.Result
[NewsSegmentation] Type = NewsSegmentation Input = TextSegmentation.Result IdolHost = localhost IdolPort = 9000 MaxStoryDuration = 30minutes
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <ImageClassification> field with subfields for each object class identified by Media Server Image Classification. e.g:
<ImageClassification> <objectclass confidence="99.26" classifier="imagenet" startTime="227000" duration="20000">badger</objectclass> </ImageClassification>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ImageClassification> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ObjectClassResult]"> <objectclass> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectClassResult/classification/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="classifier"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectClassResult/classifier"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="ObjectClassResult/classification/identifier"/> </objectclass> </xsl:for-each> </ImageClassification> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = Classification
[Classification] Type = ObjectClass Classifier = imagenet
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <ImageComparison> field with subfields for each changed region identified by Media Server Image Comparison. e.g:
<ImageComparison> <comparison identifier="b008964f39266e83da9d8983b7ff261e" database="referenceimages" imagelabel="camera1"> <changeregion score="99.26" top="31" left="54" width="65" height="22"/> <changeregion score="96.83" top="145" left="26" width="32" height="28"/> </comparison> <comparison identifier="526f886c2bca6d27b956c5a3528e8585" database="referenceimages" imagelabel="camera2"> <changeregion score="96.28" top="131" left="56" width="67" height="86"/> <changeregion score="86.45" top="16" left="78" width="53" height="32"/> </comparison> </ImageComparison>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ImageComparison> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ImageComparisonResult]"> <comparison> <xsl:attribute name="identifier"><xsl:value-of select="ImageComparisonResult/identity/identifier"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="database"><xsl:value-of select="ImageComparisonResult/identity/database"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="imagelabel"><xsl:value-of select="ImageComparisonResult/identity/imagelabel"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:for-each select="ImageComparisonResult/changedRegion"> <changeregion> <xsl:attribute name="score"><xsl:value-of select="score"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="left"><xsl:value-of select="region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="top"><xsl:value-of select="region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="width"><xsl:value-of select="region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="height"><xsl:value-of select="region/height"/></xsl:attribute> </changeregion> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> </comparison> </xsl:for-each> </ImageComparison> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = ImageComparison
[ImageComparison] Type = ImageComparison Database = Identifier =
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <Keyframes> field with subfields for each keyframe identified by Media Server Keyframe Extraction. e.g:
<Keyframes> <keyframe startTime="227000" duration="20000"/> <keyframe startTime="19787000" duration="20000"/> </Keyframes>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <Keyframes> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[KeyFrameData]"> <keyframe startTime="{timestamp/startTime}" duration="{timestamp/duration}"/> </xsl:for-each> </Keyframes> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = Keyframes
[Keyframes] Type = Keyframe
####################### Output ########################## [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <FaceRecognition> field with subfields for each face identified by Media Server Face Recognition. Includes demographic, state, and clothing information where available. e.g:
<FaceRecognition> <face confidence="50.1" database="politicians" imagelabel="image1" age="Elderly" ethnicity="Hispanic" expression="Neutral" eyesopen="true" spectacles="true" clothingregiontype="Full" clothingtop="270" clothingleft="0" clothingwidth="720" clothingheight="306" clothingcolors="40 51 55,220 219 221,109 118 121,130 32 27,204 150 154,126 78 121" clothingcolornames=",,,,," clothingcolorproportions="46.53,22.46,12.77,12.37,3.97,1.89" facetop="84" faceleft="282" facewidth="236" faceheight="236" startTime="0" duration="15180000">A N Example</face> <face age="Adult" ethnicity="Caucasian" expression="Neutral" eyesopen="true" spectacles="false" clothingregiontype="Full" clothingtop="207" clothingleft="15" clothingwidth="360" clothingheight="369" clothingcolors="45 43 43,211 199 207,78 42 78,111 100 62,133 24 22" clothingcolornames=",,,," clothingcolorproportions="53.22,17.95,15.17,7.46,6.21" facetop="146" faceleft="269" facewidth="179" faceheight="179" startTime="627000" duration="19140000"/> </FaceRecognition>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media
unrecognised faces will have empty values and no confidence, database and imagelabel attributes. -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <FaceRecognition> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[FaceRecognitionResult]"> <xsl:variable name="id"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/id"/></xsl:variable> <face> <!-- demographic --> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[DemographicsResult/id = $id]"> <xsl:attribute name="age"><xsl:value-of select="DemographicsResult/age"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="ethnicity"><xsl:value-of select="DemographicsResult/ethnicity"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:for-each>
<!-- state --> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[FaceStateResult/id = $id]"> <xsl:attribute name="expression"><xsl:value-of select="FaceStateResult/expression"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="eyesopen"><xsl:value-of select="FaceStateResult/eyesopen"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="spectacles"><xsl:value-of select="FaceStateResult/spectacles"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:for-each>
<!-- clothing --> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ClothingResult/id = $id]"> <xsl:attribute name="clothingregiontype"><xsl:value-of select="ClothingResult/regiontype"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="clothingtop"><xsl:value-of select="ClothingResult/region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="clothingleft"><xsl:value-of select="ClothingResult/region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="clothingwidth"><xsl:value-of select="ClothingResult/region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="clothingheight"><xsl:value-of select="ClothingResult/region/height"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:for-each>
<!-- clothing colours--> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ColorClusterResult/id = $id]"> <xsl:attribute name="clothingcolors"> <xsl:for-each select="ColorClusterResult/cluster/color"> <xsl:if test="position() > 1"><xsl:text>,</xsl:text></xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="."/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="clothingcolornames"> <xsl:for-each select="ColorClusterResult/cluster/colorname"> <xsl:if test="position() > 1"><xsl:text>,</xsl:text></xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="."/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="clothingcolorproportions"> <xsl:for-each select="ColorClusterResult/cluster/proportion"> <xsl:if test="position() > 1"><xsl:text>,</xsl:text></xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="."/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:for-each>
<!-- face position--> <xsl:attribute name="facetop"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/face/region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="faceleft"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/face/region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="facewidth"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/face/region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="faceheight"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/face/region/height"/></xsl:attribute>
<!-- timestamp --> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if>
<!-- identity --> <xsl:if test="FaceRecognitionResult/identity/identifier"> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/identity/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="database"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/identity/database"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="imagelabel"><xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/identity/imagelabel"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="FaceRecognitionResult/identity/identifier"/> </xsl:if> </face> </xsl:for-each> </FaceRecognition> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = FaceDetect AnalysisEngine1 = FaceDemographics AnalysisEngine2 = FaceState AnalysisEngine3 = FaceRecognize AnalysisEngine4 = Clothing AnalysisEngine5 = ClothingColors
[FaceDetect] Type = FaceDetect
[FaceDemographics] Type = Demographics Input = FaceDetect.ResultWithSource
[FaceState] Type = FaceState Input = FaceDetect.ResultWithSource
[FaceRecognize] Type = FaceRecognize Input = FaceDetect.ResultWithSource RecognitionThreshold = 60 MaxRecognitionResults = 1
[Clothing] Type = Clothing Input = FaceDetect.ResultWithSource
[ClothingColors] Type = ColorCluster Input = Clothing.ResultWithSource RestrictToInputRegion = True
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds an <ObjectDetection> field with subfields for each object class identified by Media Server Object Detection. e.g:
<ObjectDetection> <object confidence="99.26" detector="roadscene" left="31" top="54" width="206" height="159" startTime="227000" duration="2000000">van</objectclass> </ObjectDetection>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ObjectDetection> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ObjectDetectionResult]"> <object> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/classification/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="detector"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/detector"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="left"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="top"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="width"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="height"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/region/height"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="ObjectDetectionResult/classification/identifier"/> </object> </xsl:for-each> </ObjectDetection> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = ObjectDetection
[ObjectDetection] Type = ObjectDetection Detector = headandshoulder
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <VehicleMakeModelRecognition> field with subfields for each vehicle identified by Media Server. e.g:
<VehicleMakeModelRecognition> <vehicle startTime="0" duration="15180000"> <numberplate country="GB" type="Regular" typecode="uk19" sensitivity="108" score="100" center="(521,430)" region="(512,423)(563,420)(562,442)(512,439)">EX477PLE</numberplate> <colors> <color name="Red" proportion="46.53">255 0 0</color> <color name="Green" proportion="35.68">0 255 0</color> </colors> <makemodel grillepatch="(168,172)(473,172)(473,280)(168,280)" grillepercentage="100" make="Ford" makescore="100" database="Cars" imagelabel="image1" confidence="77">FocusRS</makemodel> </vehicle> </VehicleMakeModelRecognition>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media
unrecognised vehicle <makemodel> elements will have empty values and no confidence, database and imagelabel attributes. -->
<xsl:template name="point"> <xsl:text>(</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./x"/> <xsl:text>,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./y"/> <xsl:text>)</xsl:text> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <VehicleMakeModelRecognition> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[NumberPlateResult]"> <xsl:variable name="id"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/id"/></xsl:variable> <vehicle> <!-- numberplate --> <numberplate> <xsl:attribute name="country"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/country"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="type"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/platetype"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="typecode"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/platetypecode"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="sensitivity"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/sensitivityscore"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="score"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/score"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="center"> <xsl:for-each select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/platecenter"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="region"> <xsl:for-each select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/plateregion/point"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/plateread"/> </numberplate>
<!-- vehicle colours--> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ColorClusterResult/id = $id]"> <colors> <xsl:for-each select="ColorClusterResult/cluster"> <color> <xsl:attribute name="name"><xsl:value-of select="colorname"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="proportion"><xsl:value-of select="proportion"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="color"/> </color> </xsl:for-each> </colors> </xsl:for-each>
<!-- vehicle model --> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[VehicleModelResult/id = $id]"> <makemodel> <xsl:attribute name="grillepatch"> <xsl:for-each select="VehicleModelResult/grillepatch/point"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="grillepercentage"><xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/grillepercentage"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="make"><xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/vehiclemake"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="makescore"><xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/vehiclemakescore"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="VehicleModelResult/identity/identifier"> <xsl:attribute name="database"><xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/identity/database"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="imagelabel"><xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/identity/imagelabel"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/identity/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="VehicleModelResult/identity/identifier"/> </xsl:if> </makemodel> </xsl:for-each>
<!-- timestamp --> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> </vehicle> </xsl:for-each> </VehicleMakeModelRecognition> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = ANPR AnalysisEngine1 = VehicleMakeModelRecognition AnalysisEngine2 = VehicleColors
[ANPR] Type = NumberPlate Location = GB RegionUnit = percent Region = 20,10,60,80 Sensitivity = 60 Integration = moving
[VehicleMakeModelRecognition] Type = VehicleModel Input = ANPR.ResultWithSource Database = cars
[VehicleColors] Type = ColorCluster Input = VehicleMakeModelRecognition.ResultWithSource RestrictToInputRegion = True
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <SpeakerIdentification> field with subfields for each speaker identified by Media Server Speaker Identification. e.g:
<SpeakerIdentification> <speaker confidence="0" gender="NonSpeech_" startTime="0" duration="49000">NonSpeech_</speaker> <speaker confidence="0" gender="MALE" startTime="49000" duration="17832000">Unknown_</speaker> <speaker confidence="0" gender="MALE" startTime="17881000" duration="9060000">A N Example</speaker> </SpeakerIdentification>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <LanguageDetection> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[SpeakerIdResult]"> <speaker> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="SpeakerIdResult/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="gender"><xsl:value-of select="SpeakerIdResult/gender"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="SpeakerIdResult/speakerName"/> </speaker> </xsl:for-each> </LanguageDetection> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = IdSpeakers
[IdSpeakers] Type = SpeakerId SpeakerIdServers = localhost:15000 TemplateSet =
####################### Output ########################## [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <AudioMatching> field with subfields for each match identified by Media Server Audio Matching. e.g:
<AudioMatching> <match confidence="96.7" startTime="25156922" duration="10000000">Company Advert</match> </AudioMatching>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <AudioMatching> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[AudioMatchResult]"> <match> <xsl:attribute name="pack"><xsl:value-of select="AudioMatchResult/pack"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="score"><xsl:value-of select="AudioMatchResult/score"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="recognitionOffset"><xsl:value-of select="AudioMatchResult/recognitionOffset"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="AudioMatchResult/identifier"/> </match> </xsl:for-each> </AudioMatching> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = AudioMatching
[AudioMatching] Type = AudioMatch AudioMatchServers = localhost:15000 Pack =
####################### Output ########################## [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <ObjectRecognition> field with subfields for each object recognised by Media Server Object Recognition. e.g:
<ObjectRecognition> <object confidence="94.6" imagelabel="main_logo" database="logos" boundary="(106,100)(271,101)(272,183)(107,183)">HPE</object> </ObjectRecognition>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media --> <xsl:template name="point"> <xsl:text>(</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./x"/> <xsl:text>,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./y"/> <xsl:text>)</xsl:text> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ObjectRecognition> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[ObjectResult]"> <object> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectResult/identity/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="imagelabel"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectResult/identity/imagelabel"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="database"><xsl:value-of select="ObjectResult/identity/database"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="boundary"> <xsl:for-each select="ObjectResult/boundary/point"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="ObjectResult/identity/identifier"/> </object> </xsl:for-each> </ObjectRecognition> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = ObjectRecognition
[ObjectRecognition] Type = object Database =
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <OCR> field with subfields for each area of text identified by Media Server OCR, and a complete text representation of the OCR to the document content. e.g:
<OCR> <text confidence="94" angle="0" source="image" top="421" left="483" width="104" height="17" startTime="20227000" duration="6620000">media server</text> <text confidence="92" angle="0" source="image" top="422" left="151" width="69" height="20" startTime="20227000" duration="6620000">OCR</text> </OCR> <DRECONTENT>media server OCR</DRECONTENT>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <OCR> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[OCRResult]"> <text> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="angle"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/angle"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="source"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/source"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="top"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="left"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="width"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="height"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/height"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/text"/> </text> </xsl:for-each> </OCR> <DRECONTENT> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record/OCRResult"> <xsl:value-of select="text"/><xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </DRECONTENT> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = Image
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = OCR
[OCR] Type = OCR Languages = en
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <SpeechToText> field with subfields for each word identified by Media Server Speech To Text, and complete text representation of the audio to the document content. e.g:
<SpeechToText> <text confidence="0" startTime="0" duration="140000">media</text> <text confidence="0" startTime="140000" duration="200000">server</text> <text confidence="0" startTime="248000" duration="215000"/> <text confidence="0" startTime="463000" duration="250000">speech</text> <text confidence="0" startTime="713000" duration="740000">processing</text> <text confidence="100" startTime="1453000" duration="0">.</text> </SpeechToText> <DRECONTENT>media server speech processing.</DRECONTENT>
Periods of silence are indicated by text elements with no value.
Sentence breaks are indicated by text elements with the value '.'.
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <SpeechToText> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[SpeechToTextResult]"> <text> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="SpeechToTextResult/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="SpeechToTextResult/text = '<SIL>'"></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="SpeechToTextResult/text = '<s>'"><xsl:text>.</xsl:text></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="SpeechToTextResult/text"/></xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </text> </xsl:for-each> </SpeechToText> <DRECONTENT> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record/SpeechToTextResult"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="text = '<SIL>'"></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="text = '<s>'"><xsl:text>. </xsl:text></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="text"/><xsl:text> </xsl:text></xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </DRECONTENT> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = TranscribeSpeech
[TranscribeSpeech] Type = speechtotext SpeechToTextServers = localhost:15000 Language = ENUK Mode = relative ModeValue = 0.8
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <SceneAnalysis> field with subfields for each alarm event raised by Media Server Scene Analysis. e.g:
<SceneAnalysis> <object score="68" timeinroi="120" center="(390,20)" velocity="(-29,0)" boundary="(387,3)(381,15)(381,33)(387,33)(390,30)(396,12)(396,9)(393,3)" history="(394,18)(390,18)" startTime="2324000" duration="120000" >person</object> </SceneAnalysis>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template name="point"> <xsl:text>(</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./x"/> <xsl:text>,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./y"/> <xsl:text>)</xsl:text> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <SceneAnalysis> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[SceneAnalysisResult]"> <object> <xsl:attribute name="score"><xsl:value-of select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/alarm/score"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="timeinroi"><xsl:value-of select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/timeinroi"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="center"> <xsl:for-each select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/center"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="velocity"> <xsl:for-each select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/velocity"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="boundary"> <xsl:for-each select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/boundingpoly/point"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="history"> <xsl:for-each select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/history/point"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="SceneAnalysisResult/object/alarm/category"/> </object> </xsl:for-each> </SceneAnalysis> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = SceneAnalysis
[SceneAnalysis] Type = SceneAnalysis TrainingCfgName = PersonLoitering30secs.cfg
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <ANPR> field with subfields for each numberplate identified by Media Server ANPR. e.g:
<ANPR> <numberplate country="GB" type="Regular" typecode="uk19" sensitivity="108" score="100" center="(521,430)" region="(512,423)(563,420)(562,442)(512,439)" startTime="20787000" duration="260000">EX477PLE</numberplate> </ANPR>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template name="point"> <xsl:text>(</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./x"/> <xsl:text>,</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./y"/> <xsl:text>)</xsl:text> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ANPR> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[NumberPlateResult]"> <numberplate> <xsl:attribute name="country"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/country"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="type"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/platetype"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="typecode"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/platetypecode"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="sensitivity"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/sensitivityscore"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="score"><xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/score"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="center"> <xsl:for-each select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/platecenter"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="region"> <xsl:for-each select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/plateregion/point"><xsl:call-template name="point"/></xsl:for-each> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="NumberPlateResult/numberplate/plateread"/> </numberplate> </xsl:for-each> </ANPR> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0=ANPR
[ANPR] Type = NumberPlate Location = GB RegionUnit = percent Region = 20,10,60,80 Sensitivity = 60 Integration = moving
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <ColorClustering> field with subfields for each color identified by Media Server Color Clustering. e.g:
<ColorClustering> <color name="Red" proportion="46.53">255 0 0</color> <color name="Green" proportion="35.68">0 255 0</color> </ColorClustering> -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <ColorClustering> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record/ColorClusterResult/cluster"> <color> <xsl:attribute name="name"><xsl:value-of select="colorname"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="proportion"><xsl:value-of select="proportion"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="color"/> </color> </xsl:for-each> </ColorClustering> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = Image
[Image] Type = image
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = ColorClustering
[ColorClustering] Type = ColorCluster
####################### Output ####################### [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <Barcodes> field with subfields for each barcode identified by Media Server Barcode Recognition. e.g:
<Barcodes> <barcode type="Code-128" top="66" left="94" width="311" height="98" startTime="227000" duration="20000">some text</barcode> </Barcodes>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <Barcodes> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[BarcodeResult]"> <barcode> <xsl:attribute name="type"><xsl:value-of select="BarcodeResult/barcodeType"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="top"><xsl:value-of select="BarcodeResult/region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="left"><xsl:value-of select="BarcodeResult/region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="width"><xsl:value-of select="BarcodeResult/region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="height"><xsl:value-of select="BarcodeResult/region/height"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="BarcodeResult/text"/> </barcode> </xsl:for-each> </Barcodes> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

####################### Ingest ####################### [Ingest] IngestEngine = AudioVideo
[AudioVideo] Type = libav IngestDateTime = 0
[Image] Type = image IngestDateTime = 0
####################### Analysis ####################### [Analysis] AnalysisEngine0 = Barcodes
[Barcodes] Type = Barcode Orientation = any
####################### Output ########################## [Output] OutputEngine0 = response
[response] Type = response
